attributes.action: Organise a state funeral/procession so we can honour our ancestors who served in the first world war
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Along with many, many other families in the UK my great grandfather gave his life in the first world war.  I never met him but would like to honour him and the hundreds of thousands like him who made the ultimate sacrifice for us all.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
